reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 585/05: TIME LIMIT FOR APPLICATION OF REGULATIONS UNDER SECTION 88.0.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TIME LIMIT FOR APPLICATION OF REGULATIONS UNDER SECTION 88.0.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Ontario Energy Board Act, 1998   Loi de 1998 sur la Commission de l’énergie de l’Ontario

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 88.0.1 (2.1) of the Act, a regulation made under clause 88.0.1 (2) (a), (b) (c), (c.1), (d), (e), (f), (g) or (h) applies only with respect to electricity generated or consumed before April 1, 2005. O. Reg. 585/05, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of subsection 88.0.1 (2.1) of the Act, a regulation made under clause 88.0.1 (2) (a), (b) (c), (c.1), (d), (e), (f), (g) or (h) applies only with respect to electricity generated or consumed before April 1, 2005. O. Reg. 585/05, s. 1.
